Aivy.title: Aivy â€” Scalable AI agents on Solana
Aivy.intro: Personified AI agents (cNFT) with fuel, upgrades and Solana Agent Kit integration.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.onchain: On-chain state with PDA, CPI to SPL/Token-2022, cNFT avatar (Bubblegum).
architecture.offchain: Action orchestration via Solana Agent Kit (transfers, swaps, blinks...).
architecture.wallet: Agent â†” user wallet linking, access policies.
architecture.security: Spend policies, whitelists, fee limits, signed logging.

MetaFlow.title: MetaFlow â€” On-chain subscriptions, PPV & live (USDC on Solana)
MetaFlow.intro: Creators sell memberships, one-off PPV and live tickets. Payments use USDC (SPL). Content is stored/deployed via Helia (IPFS) for decentralization, and lives run on Livepeer. Access and expirations are enforced on-chain with dynamic commission splits (creator/platform/partners).

gallery.creator: Creator onboarding & creation form
gallery.unlocked: Example of unlocked content after on-chain check

SunSaver.title: SunSaver â€” Private beach spot reservation in Italy
SunSaver.intro: SunSaver lets users book one or multiple spots on private beaches in Italy. Each spot includes a parasol by default; managers can configure equipment options like single sunbed, double sunbeds, or a directorâ€™s chair. Admins create beaches, managers add concessions and inventory, and users reserve for chosen dates and durations. Payments are simulated via PayPal Developer (sandbox). The project started with Jakarta EE and later migrated to Spring Boot with Thymeleaf.

booking.label: Booking flow
booking.hint: Dates, duration, parasol included + equipment options
